statements: DELETE FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE vote='Yes' AND vote_date='2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE politician_id=100 AND bill_id=200;
DELETE FROM LegislationDatabase WHERE politician_id = 100 AND vote = 'yes';
DELETE FROM lawmakers WHERE id = 5 AND state = 'California';
DELETE FROM bills WHERE voter_id IN (SELECT id FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican') AND vote_result = 'Passed';
DELETE FROM voting_records WHERE record_id = 10 AND lawmaker_id = 5;
DELETE FROM committees WHERE name = 'Finance Committee';
